alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 6:51AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of West Tennessee, including the following counties, Haywood and Madison. * WHEN...Until 730 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 648 AM CDT, minor flooding is likely across portions of Haywood and Madison Counties. Most of the heavy rain has ended, but runoff from earlier storms may continue to pose a threat for urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Brownsville, Holly Grove, Bemis, Leighton, Denmark, Huntersville, Neely, Allens, Westover, Sunnyhill, Malesus, Gilmore, Oakview, East Union, Madison Hall, Maple Grove and Turnpike. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
